name: cordova-plugin-prerequisites-checker
author: iGATES - INFORMATION GATES LTD <oferDavidyan@users.noreply.github.com>
description: Checks whether Android System prerequisites is installed and enabled or not on Cordova.

scripts.testing:setup: cordova create playground org.cpcwc.playground playground && cd ./playground && cordova platform add android --save && cordova plugin add cordova-plugin-prerequisites-checker --force --link --searchpath ..
scripts.testing:start: cd ./playground && cordova plugin remove cordova-plugin-prerequisites-checker && cordova plugin add cordova-plugin-prerequisites-checker --force --link --searchpath .. && cordova run android
